# Dengue cases from the "S達o Paulo" state of Brazil

## Description

The `dengue_SP` example data set reports the weekly number of notified dengue cases in the municipality of S達o Paulo together with climatic covariates. Data was sourced from Infodengue (see `@source`).

```r
dengue_SP
```

## Format

A data frame with 678 rows and 8 columns:

- **`date`**: First day of the week, in date format ("%d-%m-%Y")
- **`geocode`**: Unique ID code for S達o Paulo microregion
- **`cases`**: Number of notified dengue cases
- **`year`**: Year 2000 - 2022
- **`temp_med`**: Weekly average daily mean temperature
- **`precip_tot`**: Weekly cumulative precipitation
- **`enso`**: El Ni単o-Southern Oscillation Index
- **`pop`**: Number of inhabitants

## Source

[Infodengue API](https://info.dengue.mat.br/services/api)
